Name: Add-KdsRootKey
Synopsis: Generates a new root key for the Microsoft Group KdsSvc within Active Directory.

Name: Clear-KdsCache
Synopsis: Clears the group key cache of the local computer.

Name: Get-KdsConfiguration
Synopsis: Retrieves the current configuration of the Microsoft Group KdsSvc from Active Directory.

Name: Get-KdsRootKey
Synopsis: Retrieves a list of root key values stored by the Microsoft Group KdsSvc.

Name: Set-KdsConfiguration
Synopsis: Sets the configuration of Microsoft Group KdsSvc.
